plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes cows eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like sunshine!
🐄 Animals like to eat me!
⚽ You can play on me!

plant.question: I am tall and have leaves. Birds like to live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have a trunk!
🍁 My leaves change colors sometimes!
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me!

plant.question: I am red and yummy. You can pick me from a plant and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ I am often red!
🌱 You can find me in a garden!
😋 I am sweet and juicy!

plant.question: I am yellow and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am a fruit!
🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
〰️ I am curved!

plant.question: I am small and grow in the garden. Bees love to visit me for my sweet food. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I have petals!
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me!
💐 People give me as gifts!

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am a vegetable!
🐇 Rabbits like to eat me!
🥒 I am often used in pickles!

plant.question: I grow on a vine and make juice that you can drink. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am small and round!
🥤 You can make juice from me!
🍷 Adults use me to make wine!

plant.question: I am orange and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable!
🧡 I am the color of pumpkins!
👓 Eating me is good for your eyes!

plant.question: I'm a big, round fruit with a green rind and red inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I'm a popular summer treat!
⚫ You can find black seeds inside me.
💦 I'm very juicy.

plant.question: I am a seed that makes yummy yellow oil when squeezed. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I grow tall and have a big yellow flower.
🛢️ My oil is used for cooking.
🐿️ Squirrels and birds love to eat me

food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 My color reminds you of sunshine!
🍌 You can eat me as a snack.
🐒 Monkeys peel me before eating me.

food.question: I am round and red. You can take a bite. Sometimes I am green too! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My color is the same as a firetruck!
🌱 I grow on trees.
🦷 I am good for you to eat.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐰 I am what Bugs Bunny likes to eat!
👓 I am good for your eyes.

food.question: I am small and juicy. I grow in bunches. I can be red or green or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow on a vine.
🥤 You can make juice from me.
🧺 I am often sold in a bag.

food.question: I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. I come in lots of flavors! What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 You keep me in the freezer.
🍦 I am a sweet treat!
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I am green and look like a little tree. You can dip me in ranch. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I'm a healthy vegetable.
🌳 I look like a small tree.
🥗 I can be eaten raw or cooked.

food.question: I am made of milk. I can be hard or soft. Mice love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from cows (usually).
🐭 Mice often are shown eating me in cartoons!
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.

food.question: I am orange on the outside and orange inside with lots of seeds. I am a fall treat. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am used to make Jack-O-Lanterns!
🥧 You can make a pie out of me.
🍂 I grow in the fall.

food.question: I am made from wheat and baked in an oven. You can put butter and jelly on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am made from grains.
🍞 You need me to make a sandwich.
🔥 I am baked in an oven.

food.question: I am a fruit but sometimes I am in your salad. I have a big seed in the middle. I am green and creamy. What am I?

hints.text: 🥑 I am a healthy fat.
🥗 I can be in your salad or on toast.
🇲🇽 I am used to make guacamole!
